content.text:
# Ancient Symbols (Unicode block)

|script2 =
|symbols    = Roman weights and currency
|5_1        = 12
|7_0        = 1
|13_0       = 1
|note =
}}
Ancient Symbols is a Unicode block containing Roman characters for currency, weights, and measures.  It also contains the "GREEK SYMBOL TAU RHO" (tau rho or the staurogram (â³¨)) at U+101A0.
Block
History
